description:
Welcome to the all-new Zappar app. Zappar connects the digital world with the things round about you. All you have to do is get the app and zap!

It's like opening a window to another dimension, where everyday things can transform to unlock videos, games or even 3D characters to play with right there in front of you.

All you have to do is download the app and point the camera at a zapcode or Zappar Powered products and images to make them come to life.

The Zapcode Creator lets you build and share your own zaps, visit www.zapcode.it to give it a go (it’s super easy!).

You’ll find zapcodes on more and more things out in the wild for you to unlock. Everything from magazines, t-shirts, puzzles, hats, books, greetings cards, phone cases and loads more!

To see the latest zaps and experience the Zappar magic download the app and head to www.zappar.com

We hope you enjoy the ongoing updates and additions and really do appreciate your feedback so please contact us with any questions, suggestions or concerns at support@zappar.com (or send a messenger pigeon).

Zappar. You're seeing things.
releaseNotes: Update to support the latest and greatest Zappar content
